sqlMap.select: select SIGNATURE.id, SIGNATURE.versionId, SIGNATURE.userId, SIGNATURE.deleted, SYSTEMUSER.name as delegateName, COUNTRY.name as countryDescription, COUNTRY.id as countryId, SYSTEMUSER.job as job from SIGNATURE, SYSTEMUSER, COUNTRY where SIGNATURE.versionId = #id# AND SIGNATURE.userId = SYSTEMUSER.id AND SYSTEMUSER.countryId = COUNTRY.id order by COUNTRY.name ASC

select SIGNATURE.id, SIGNATURE.versionId, SIGNATURE.userId, SIGNATURE.deleted, SYSTEMUSER.name as delegateName, COUNTRY.name as countryDescription, COUNTRY.id as countryId, SYSTEMUSER.job as job from SIGNATURE, SYSTEMUSER, COUNTRY, VERSION where SIGNATURE.versionId = VERSION.id AND VERSION.documentId = #docID# AND VERSION.number = #versionNumber# AND SIGNATURE.userId = SYSTEMUSER.id AND SYSTEMUSER.countryId = COUNTRY.id order by COUNTRY.name ASC
SELECT SIGNATURE.id, SIGNATURE.versionId, SIGNATURE.userId, SIGNATURE.deleted FROM SIGNATURE WHERE versionId = #versionId# AND userId = #userId#
SELECT id, versionId, userId, deleted FROM SIGNATURE WHERE versionId = #versionId# AND userId = #userId#
select * from SIGNATURE WHERE versionId = #versionId# AND userId = #userId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SIGNATURE ( id, versionId, userId, image, deleted) values ( #id#, #versionId#, #userId#, #image#, #deleted# )
